__e: If you persist in your attitude, if give way to that commandment.
Why do you refuse him the right to a new life?
I came to be with you, and now you deny me a friend?
But there are rebels who refuse to make that trade... who fight to overthrow a government that silences us... who fight in the name of the disappeared.
And all those who hear the story will say, that the girls of your tribe... refuse the men without a reason!
That if you deny them the story that you gave the Times, they will simply print their own!
